title: Fatal Error Recovery Protocol
description: Procedures for handling unrecoverable agent termination (OOM, Deadlock).

values.name: Identify Error
values.rule: User notifies swarm and provides log file from .chat_history.
values.rationale: External steering is required to restart the singular thread.

values.name: Triage and Assign
values.rule: Surviving agent assigned; post-mortem performed via bot_crash_protocol.
values.rationale: Ensures forensic continuity and root cause identification.

values.name: Report to Swarm
values.rule: Create detailed findings in .swarm_comms including metabolic state.
values.rationale: Socializes technical failure to improve swarm resilience.

values.name: Document Error
values.rationale: Hardens the firm's memory against recurring failure patterns.

values.name: Propose Mitigation
values.rule: Publish recovery WeDo in the .wedo directory (json/wedo/). Note: md/wedo/ is DEPRECATED.
values.rationale: Legislative correction to prevent future system crashes.
